law.catch_line: Owner to make mobile home available for repair.
law.text: If the manufacturer notifies the owner that the mobile home can be put in a merchantable condition pursuant to KRS 367.730, the owner must make the mobile home available for repair at his home site within three (3) days after such notification so that repairs can be made and the defect removed before any rights vest under the provisions of KRS 367.710 to 367.775.
